Ward {X}, where X is the number of other creatures you control with flying. [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {X}.)[/i]
[i]Landfall[/i] – Whenever a land you control enters, create two 1/2 white Drake creature tokens.
{3}{G}{U}: Populate [i](Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)[/i]
